newsitem.title: UK: NWE oil products - fuel, gas oil firm, others not.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products - fuel, gas oil firm, others not.

text.p: NWE oil products were mixed on Wednesday, traders said.
Gasoline was weaker with the NYMEX screen. Barges traded at $204 fob ARA.
Naphtha was weaker too. Russian cargoes, some with quality problems, still pressured prices lower.
Gas oil was firm with stronger premiums cancelling the effects of weaker futures.
Fuel oil barges gained up to $2 to trade at $100 fob ARA, but fell back to $98-99. The one trader that was the active buyer helped support prices. -- London Newsroom +44 171 542 8980
